task.title: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Ring Tones
task.shortdesc: Distinctive ringtone distinguishes calls from different inbound routes. You can set distinctive ringtones on different inbound routes. When a user hears the ringtone of an incoming call, he/she may notice the intention of the call.

p.note: Distinctive Ringtone feature needs support from the IP phones. We take Yealink phone as an example.

step.cmd: Log in the phone web interface, go to Settings Ring , select a ringtone and set the name.

ol.li: In the Internal Ringer Text field, enter the ringtone name.
In the Internal Ringer File drop-down list, select a ringtone file.
Click Confirm to save the settings.

step.cmd: Log in the PBX web interface, go to Settings PBX Call Control Inbound Routes , select an inbound route to edit.

ol.li: In the Distinctive Ringtone field, enter the ringtone name that is configured on IP phone.

taskbody.result: When a call comes through the inbound route, the phone will play corresponding ringtone.
